Text: Possible Termination of Enron SwapsPST Dutch Hopefully you can help me PEC is currently short NYMEX NG LD Settlement Swaps with Enron North America See attached spreadsheet for volumes and prices PEC would like to terminate these swaps The current MarktoMarket of these swaps is approximately Million in favor of PEC PEC would like to negotiate the termination of these swaps and a payment plan Thanks for your help Brian Marozas Risk Manager Peoples Energy Corporation E Randolph Drive Chicago IL Work Cell Enron Trade Volumesxls The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer Enron Trade Volumesxls
